# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We provide security updates for the latest version of Drop.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly:

1. **Do not** open a public issue
2. Email security@ciphera.net with:
   - Description of the vulnerability
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Potential impact
   - Suggested fix (if any)

3. We will:
   - Acknowledge receipt within 48 hours
   - Provide an estimated timeline for fix
   - Keep you updated on progress
   - Credit you in security advisories (if desired)

## Security Best Practices

- Keep your dependencies updated
- Use strong passwords
- Keep share links private
- Delete files after use
- Be aware that URLs may be logged

## Disclosure Policy

- Vulnerabilities will be disclosed after a fix is available
- We will provide advance notice to users when possible
- Security advisories will be published on our security page

Thank you for helping keep Drop secure!
